Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/58th
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Garfield, 59th and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/58th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
